mn148:28.4.pli: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:28.4.en: When you experience a painful feeling, if you sorrow and wail and lament, beating your breast and falling into confusion,

mn148:29-33.8.pli: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:29-33.8.en: When you experience a painful feeling, if you sorrow and wail and lament, beating your breast and falling into confusion,

mn148:34.4.pli: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṁ kandati na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:34.4.en: When you experience a painful feeling, if you don’t sorrow or wail or lament, beating your breast and falling into confusion,

mn148:39.4.pli: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṁ kandati na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:39.4.en: When you experience a painful feeling, if you don’t sorrow or wail or lament, beating your breast and falling into confusion,
